channel.title: School on Vandy Liu
channel.description: Recent content in School on Vandy Liu

item.title: VALORANT SQL School Project
item.description: Website Our intro to relational database course has a capstone project where you make an application that has a bunch of SQL commands. With two others, we created a simple website which is supposed to be used to display VALORANT stats such as match history and team information. VALORANT is a multiplayer first person shooter game made by Riot Games that is very popular currently (2020).

item.title: UBC Course Auto Registrar
item.description: UBC classroom Using Python, Selenium and BeautifulSoup4, I was able to create a bot that automatically registered me in UBC courses once a spot was available. There are other services similar to this one out there, but I wanted to be a little different. Almost all the other services available (paid and free) only notify you once a spot is available. I wanted to actually automatically register you in it.
